summary: 3 ex/potentially ex couples in Copenhagen, interconnected by extramarital affairs or work at the theater, are having problems as are their kids.
cast: Sidse Babett Knudsen|Mohammed Al-Bakier|Anders W. Berthelsen|Nicolas Bro|Casper Crump|Emil Poulsen|Charlotte Fich|Rosa K. Frederiksen|Tina Gylling Mortensen|Susanne Hacke|Rasmus Hammerich|Gyda Hansen|Mads Duelund|Fransisca Hidle|Ellen Hillingsø|Tobias Johannessen|Anna Eline Levin|Rikke Lylloff|Ellen Nyman|Nils Ole Oftebro|Ina-Miriam Rosenbaum|Per Scheel Krüger|Lennart Skipper|Elsebeth Steentoft|Lea Høyer|Malin Elisabeth Rømer Brolin-Tani|Rasmus Elton|Lindsay Hanson|Max Lindmaa|Finn Bergh
title: Over gaden under vandet
